segments.text: I see the water from the sink just pouring onto the floor, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the woman doesn't even seem to notice it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting all wet, and the water is spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the floor is slippery now, it must be dangerous to walk on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter are stacked neatly, waiting to be dried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is wearing an apron, probably to keep her dress clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink is letting in some nice sunlight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really turn off that faucet before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman realizes what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
